section.p: The Docker images provided for are the following:

ul.li: oscm-app: The Asynchronous Provisioning Platform (APP) together with the OpenStack and the Amazon Web Services (AWS) service controllers.
oscm-birt: The report engine that uses for generating reports.
oscm-branding: A branding package that can be customized by marketplace owners for designing the look and feel of marketplaces.

In addition to the above Docker images, there are additional ones available:

ul.li: oscm-db and oscm-initdb: Temporary database container and several database initialization containers. By this, the initial database schemas required for running are created.
oscm-proxy: A static Web server providing reverse proxy functionality.
